content.html: When discussing digital safety with my kids, I tell them “the minute you hit send you’ve lost control of the narrative and you need to assume the world can read what you wrote and de-contextualize it in a way in which you disagree”.
content.value: When discussing digital safety with my kids, I tell them “the minute you hit send you’ve lost control of the narrative and you need to assume the world can read what you wrote and de-contextualize it in a way in which you disagree”.
